div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Feb. 25, 1913. CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE CESKA UTULNA A SIROTCINEC(Summary)

body.p: [Translator's note: This article, filling almost two full columns, lists the contributions to the Bohemian Old People's Home and Orphanage of Bohemian corporations, American corporations, Bohemian and American individual business and professional men, Bohemian social organizations, clubs, societies, etc., and private individuals. Total: $1,189.76. No indications are given as to the period of time the contributions cover.]
